name: TravelwithJETDISTRICT
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
JET DISTRICT is your daily dose of all things global travel. We specialize in helping you travel better, find unique hot spots, and experience nightlife like a local.


Our Flash Briefing will deliver:

-- Travel tips and secrets from hoteliers, flight attendants, and seasoned world explorers
-- Unique and exciting destination ideas (Paris is sooo cliché...)
-- Upcoming world events you may want to check-out!
-- Local nightlife suggestions (please do NOT party like a tourist!)
-- Other noteworthy news occurring across the globe


You can also visit us online and check-out our "NIGHTGUIDES" by selecting "Read More" in the Alexa app.

Get Informed.
Get Wild.
Get Well-Traveled.
Get International.


***Coming Soon!*** 

JET DISTRICT Black Book.....Stay tuned!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
